jMusicMetaManager

Class AnalysisProcessor

  • java.lang.Object
    • jMusicMetaManager.AnalysisProcessor

  • public class AnalysisProcessor
extends java.lang.Object
    This class performs the actual processing to detect inconsistencies and redundancies in recording metadata. It has two constructors, one of which is used if a command line version of jMusicMetaManager is being used, and the other of which is used if the GUI is being used. In either case, the constructor provides the AnalysisPreferences that specify the data to be analyzed and the types of analysis to be performed.

    Actual processing is performed when the performProcessing method is called. The results of the analyses are saved to HTML files as specified in the AnalysisPreferences passed to the constructor.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      AnalysisProcessor(AnalysisPreferences preferences)
      Creates a new instance of AnalysisProcessor that stores the settings to base processing upon.
      AnalysisProcessor(AnalysisPreferences preferences, OptionsPanel calling_gui_panel, mckay.utilities.gui.progressbars.DoubleProgressBarTaskMonitor progress_bar)
      Creates a new instance of AnalysisProcessor that stores the settings to base processing upon and a progress bar that will be used to monitor the progress of the analysis.

      • AnalysisProcessor

        public AnalysisProcessor(AnalysisPreferences preferences)
        Creates a new instance of AnalysisProcessor that stores the settings to base processing upon. This constructor should be used if no GUI is present.
        Parameters:
        preferences - The settings to base processing upon.

      • AnalysisProcessor

        public AnalysisProcessor(AnalysisPreferences preferences,
                         OptionsPanel calling_gui_panel,
                         mckay.utilities.gui.progressbars.DoubleProgressBarTaskMonitor progress_bar)
        Creates a new instance of AnalysisProcessor that stores the settings to base processing upon and a progress bar that will be used to monitor the progress of the analysis. This constructor should be used if a GUI is present.
        Parameters:
        preferences - The settings to base processing upon.
        calling_gui_panel - The GUI panel instantiating this object.
        progress_bar - The progress bar that will monitor processing.
